channel.title: Clear quest menu
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I'm using a Devolution 7.0 base for my server and i'm just wondering how would i remove all quests from the quest menu and just make it blank.
All help is appreciated.
P.s: You cannot just search the name of the quest....i've tried

item.title: Clear quest menu
item.dc:creator: @corruptionpk317 corruptionpk317
item.description:
@corruptionpk317 wrote:

erm, just go into your text handler and delete in between the “-” where the name of the quest is, what i want to do is delete the quest completely and im stuck on that. or… for some reason my ancient altar wont work

Read full topic
